This mod makes mechanoid weapons (heavy charge blaster, inferno cannon, needle gun) obtainable by trade. It also allows the centipedes to use miniguns again.\n\nThis is a remake of the original mod I made in 2019. Now it uses patches instead of directly modifying the def files.
